column1: the first night i got this phone i put it next to me when i went to bed just to listen to my favorite music station and the handset itself doesnt weight anything its too light and feel so comfy with it

i tried to use the fm radio option , but it doesn ' t seem to really pick up the stations i listen , however i am going to try it in a different location , it may have just been my residential location
it is a great phone , if you are traveling all over the world , packed with wonderful features

and the video quality is amazing
i see many other reviews that say the same stay away from norton , they don ' t deserve you , or anyone !
